description: Source file for the DictionaryApi service in a Flutter project. Implements network requests to fetch word definitions from dictionaryapi.dev.

classes.name: DictionaryApi
classes.description: Service responsible for fetching dictionary entries from dictionaryapi.dev.

methods.name: fetchDefinitions
methods.description: Fetches dictionary entries for a given English word; returns a list of DictionaryEntry or throws an exception.
